website_summaries.verdict: The ever-popular Keds Double Decker sneakers receive another upgrade to help you dress down or dress up any outfit through the Keds Double Decker Perf Suede. This low-top kick flaunts an easy-to-wear slip-on construction that’s perfect for the ladies who are always on the move.The rich suede uppers that exude luxurious vibes get a perforated toe box for added edge and flair. Although it could be narrow-fitting, this Double Decker variation is still a great pair that ensures everyday comfort, stylish look, and signature Keds quality.
pros: ognize that the Keds Double Decker Perf Suede sneakers are stylish and go well with everything
Tons of wearers appreciate the convenience provided by this shoe’s slip-on feature
Some pleased reviewers report that they get lots of compliments because of this Double Decker shoe
The majority of wearers say that the Perf Suede edition of the Keds Double Decker sneaker is comfortable on foot
Multiple colorways are available for the Keds Double Decker Perf Suede
At least one reviewer comments that this shoe has good arch support
Many reviewers like the perforated suede design of this shoe from Keds
cons: Some wearers comment that the Keds Double Decker Perf Suede needs a bit of breaking in
The rubber part is hard to clean, not many testers note
Several purchasers note that this feels tight and narrow in the toe box

customer_reviews.title: love the shoe - hate the cut - to tight on top of foot
customer_reviews.text: I wear an 8 Med width easy all day long - these are so tight on the top of my foot to the point I have to take them off. I have tried stretching the stop - they are horrible to wear, which is a shame as the shoe is so cute
customer_reviews.author: Leah E.

customer_reviews.title: Cute and (mostly) comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Super cute shoe that I love.. but unfortunately is cut a little high in the back and has rubbed blisters at the back of my ankles. Would benefit from some extra padding (or bandaids).
customer_reviews.author: jennifer allyn

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes, runs narrow
customer_reviews.text: These Keds slip ons are my new go-to casual shoe. They are super cute & comfy. I was shocked at the well built arch support in the foot bed. I read in other reviews that these ran narrow so although I usually need a medium width, I ordered wide. That was definitely the right decision. Love these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Jane Austin

customer_reviews.title: Order 2 sizes up.
customer_reviews.text: They're pretty. But run way small. I'm an 8. I got a 9 and my foot wouldnt even go in all the way. Returned now waiting on my size 10. Uugh
customer_reviews.author: SorrowBird

customer_reviews.title: nice shoe
customer_reviews.text: They are really soft and comfortable. I usually wear W 7 1/2 in Keds but this regular 8 fits great! The color is true to the picture. My only problem now is that I can't decide which color to order next :)
customer_reviews.author: katja didier

customer_reviews.title: had to exchange for half size smaller
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are very comfortable and they look great. I had to go down from a 10 to a 9.5, otherwise perfect. There was no issue at all with exchanging with the seller.
customer_reviews.author: J. Weber

customer_reviews.title: Too tight for high arches
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love these because they are cute and stylish. I have a wide foot and high arch, so I was happy that they came in wide width. Unfortunately, they are too tight across the instep/arch area and the leather hadn’t stretched enough. If you have a wide foot with a high arch, I’d pass on these.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Biers

customer_reviews.title: My new “GO TO” run around Shoe 👟
customer_reviews.text: I Love these Keds! I saw them on my friend in gray but I prefer taupe. I’m warning you, they definitely run large. I normally wear between a 6-7 ladies shoe and I accidentally ordered these in a 6.5W so I returned these and RE-ordered a size 6 regular and still have plenty of room. They are super comfortable, like walking on a thick yoga mat. ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
customer_reviews.author: Idealist

customer_reviews.title: Cute and supportive... but tight in the worst places
customer_reviews.text: The width and support of the shoe is fine. The insole is so nice and cushioned! The color is nice (taupe) and the shoe is very well made and not flimsy. Unfortunately, the cut at the back of the heel is weird. It rubs into my ankle and makes it raw. At the toes it is just a smidge tight as well. My little toe ends up raw unless I wear socks. Wearing socks with these looks silly though and would make the shoe very tight for me. I've been trying to stretch them out and wear them in by walking around with the back of the shoe pushed in.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Returned/narrow & long
customer_reviews.text: Thought I was ordering Sperry. These were stiff and ran a bit big. My usually 7.5 would not have fit comfortably, but I think a 7 would have been too tight.
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: Too Small
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are not true to size. I wear a 7 in pretty much every shoe, and these are way too tight. Not just too small, but too narrow in the toe area so I don't think sizing up would help. Going back. Too bad, I was looking for something similar to the super comfortable Sofree slip on shoes that I loved that eventually fell apart. These are not it!
customer_reviews.author: wakebunni

customer_reviews.title: Cute but so small
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these bc I heard they were very comfortable. Unfortunately they were way too small. I normally wear a 7 and bc I read other other reviews saying they were a bit narrow I got the 7 wide. Still these shoes were extreme tight and still pretty narrow to be “wide”. I’ve had to send them back. These shoes/brand is for those with tiny feet or for those who don’t mind having their feet squeezed like a lemon while they wear them. Such a bummer
customer_reviews.author: SophiaRox

customer_reviews.title: Seemed Small
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I had to return. These shoes were so small I couldnt put my foot in. Normally I wear a 10.5-11. They were super cute and seemed like very nice quality as far as I could tell from looking and feeling. Just super small. I do have pretty high arches and these dont have any laces which could be why my foot would not fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wearing them Everyday
customer_reviews.text: First-I ordered a size Down. I have not worn a size 10 since I was in middle school but in these I am a size smaller. But it has worked out fine. I am even able to wear a thin sock with them. I have had them on 5 out 7 days a week since I got them. They are cute and work with many outfits. I hope that they are still available when I wear these out. I don't believe in buying 2 of the same.
customer_reviews.author: flgirl

customer_reviews.title: 4th pair
customer_reviews.text: I found this style of Keds a year or so ago. I love them. I wear them everywhere, especially when traveling to places where I have to walk a lot. This specific pair is my fourth pair and while they are beautiful and I will continue to wear them, they are pretty tight around the tops of the sides and dig in a bit. I will continue to hope they will one day break-in a bit more but still not the most comfortable for me. Could be my foot but have not had issues with my other pairs like this one.
customer_reviews.author: kkerekes

customer_reviews.title: Too narrow
customer_reviews.text: The problem is that they are too narrow and its really tight on top. I tried them before but it was a size larger than mine, they were too big for my foot but felt really comfy, so i got my size and sadly i've been able to wear them just once.
customer_reviews.author: Johanna C

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable of any that I have purchased. LOVE the color and the comfort. Fit's true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Wide still too small
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a 7.5 in sandls and 8 in closed toe shoes. I bought the 8 Wide and it is still very tight and hurts. So disappointed as I really wanted to love these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Ren R

customer_reviews.title: Tight instep
customer_reviews.text: Cute shoe. Length ok but toe box height, bottom to top of foot, tight. Even with elastic gussets still tight. Elastic gives but shoe fabric did not. Constantly felt tight across instep. Sadly I could nit stand that and Returned shoes. Also elastic looked like it had some flaws and would not be up to extra stress.
customer_reviews.author: Hazel the Housekeeper

customer_reviews.title: Too Narrow
customer_reviews.text: These are super cute shoes, but even in a larger size they are super narrow. If you wear a size 9 or larger, these likely won’t be comfortable. I got to be honest, I have never met anyone with my shoe size that has ever had feet this narrow. I don’t know what show companies are thinking.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah L.

customer_reviews.title: Very narrow
customer_reviews.text: Very narrow even though I ordered and received a wide. So complicated to return. I donated them to the church clothing closet.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Bowman

customer_reviews.title: A little narrow
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes but they are a little narrow. I have somewhat narrow feet and I wish they had more room. Shoes are very cute and comfortable. Easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Jen M

customer_reviews.title: Super cute but tight across the top.
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of these shoes, but like others have stated they are tight across the top of my foot. I'm hoping after wearing them some they will stretch out, because they are so cute! I've only worn them once inside the house. Will update after wearing them if they loosen up or not. I normally wear a size 5 but ordered the 5.5 and they fit perfectly accept for the tightness across the top.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Constantly biting back of foot
customer_reviews.text: I took a half size up and this shoe still "bites" the back of my foot. It's very stiff in the back and looks weird with ankle socks. Overall unhappy with this shoe even though the color is cool
customer_reviews.author: Sophia

customer_reviews.title: REALLY tight on my feet.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these looking for a comfortable and casual show option. They were so tight that I couldn’t get my foot in the shoe with a sock on, and could barely get my bare foot it. The shoes are cute, but really uncomfortable, so I returned them. I’m not sure if the color matters, but I purchased size 8 in taupe.
customer_reviews.author: lizurd

customer_reviews.title: Nice casual shoes
customer_reviews.text: The pair I ordered (9 US) fit as expected, and they stay on my feet nicely. They look just like the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Right on ankle
customer_reviews.text: ultimately I returned. I gent like the front went up way too high which made the opening fit tight. They were uncomfortable because how tight they were on my ankle. Otherwise I liked how they looked.
customer_reviews.author: KatelynTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: After walking on the backs, these are great!
customer_reviews.text: A bit snug, and at first the heel of the shoe REALLY HURT! But I folded the heels down and walked on them for a day (so that they were more like slip-ins) and it worked like a charm. Super cute, now tthey are super comfy and I will likely get another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Mac

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite shoes right now. They are so comfy and I can wear them all day while on my feet.
customer_reviews.author: MommaL

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and cute
customer_reviews.text: I love love LOVE these shoes!! They’re so comfortable right out of the box without socks. They are not right anywhere. I wore them on a walking tour the day I got them, and was so happy with them all day. I got the taupe ones and love them with everything (stripes to leggings!).
customer_reviews.author: MollyG

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I would not buy these again. They do not fit good. They are very heavy, which I don’t care for.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Joiner

customer_reviews.title: Unsatisfied customer!!
customer_reviews.text: Shoes came apart after a few times of wearing them! Contacted the company and they only have a 30 day policy, it was 40 days since we purchased the shoes. Company wouldn’t stand behind a defective pair of shoes! Very disappointed and will never buy from shoebacca again!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have high arches so I was concerned about other reviews that said it was too tight on the instep but I don't have a problem with it. They are very comfortable and have a cushion-y insert.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Keds Women's Double Decker Perf Suede Sneaker
customer_reviews.text: A great shoe. Stylish, comfortable and fits true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Denise H.

customer_reviews.title: Mom shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Literally my family shoe and the most comfortable mom shoe ever!
customer_reviews.author: Monica Muhs

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable overall, but tight on the arch, narrower than expected
customer_reviews.text: Well made comfortable sneakers, but they are narrower than expected and exert pressure on the upper arch after a while. Trying to break them in, or as a last resort to cut part of the elastic band on the sides for additional room.
customer_reviews.author: A CHARRY

customer_reviews.title: A little tight at first, but...
customer_reviews.text: These are really cute! Once you have worn them a few times, they do get more comfortable. They are a little tight on top of the foot, but that's the way this type of shoe usually fits. I bought the taupe and the wine color and they are both true to color!
customer_reviews.author: Taylord

customer_reviews.title: Excellent arch support
customer_reviews.text: Well-constructed shoe with excellent arch support. Insole is well-padded. Shoe is a bit on the heavy side, probably because of the padded insole. Overall it's a comfortable, stylish shoe. Wear them with mid-cut sock liners and the liners will be invisible.
customer_reviews.author: G. McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: Too stiff, couldn't slip it on
customer_reviews.text: This shoe has no flexiblility. I couldn't get my foot into it. Sent back.
customer_reviews.author: LY..49

customer_reviews.title: Sizing.
customer_reviews.text: It's a very good looking shoe. Well made. For me, the size 8 is a little snug for my great toe. However, a larger size would have proble been too big. I feel like they will stretch in time. They are not uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Christy K.

customer_reviews.title: Wish I Had Read the Reviews
customer_reviews.text: I always read the reviews before buying anything but this time I didn't and I'm sorry. These are way too tight to slip on or wear. AND it's going to cost me $4.98 to return them to the shipper. Next time I'll be sure to read the reviews and only order if Amazon is the shipper.
customer_reviews.author: vlh114

customer_reviews.title: Keds slide on tennis shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love this slip on Ked shoe! Have bought before in size 7.5, but were to tight and small! Had to order an 8! True to color
customer_reviews.author: KAREN SPALDING

customer_reviews.title: Maybe have a defect in fabric
customer_reviews.text: I love them and they fit great BUT, I wore them on a hot day without socks and my feet were sweating a bit and the sweat I guess came stained the top of part of the shoe which has never happened. So now I can these dark sweat stains on the nude color shoes. Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: misia

customer_reviews.title: These are great looking and fitting shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I really like these shoes, both the leather upper, the color, and the fit. They are nicer than I thought they would be for the price. I ordered another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Havlin-Cryer

customer_reviews.title: I bought these shoes to use on my trip to ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes to use on my trip to Europe, I was about to last in them all day.
customer_reviews.author: M. S. V.

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! They are so comfortable. I can wear them all day long. Very cute too! I think they run more on the narrow side.
customer_reviews.author: Shanna  B.

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe but fit off
customer_reviews.text: I have other keds slip ones and fit not the same. I have a narrowish food and these were narrow on me
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So good I just ordered them in a different color as well.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina C.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and fun
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and will be a fun, versatile addition to my wardrobe. I chose a neutral color so the shoes will be worn often.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Reader

customer_reviews.title: Not made for an American foot.
customer_reviews.text: Shoe cut into the heel and the shoe was too flat.
customer_reviews.author: G. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but blisters the toes
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is comfortable. The only down side is it rubs the top of my toes causing them to blister. I have narrow feet so the fit was great. I first tried the dr scholls which didn’t stay on my heels well.
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana A

customer_reviews.title: Better in wide even if you're a medium.
customer_reviews.text: Love the style. Waited for the "wide" size and it's perfect. I am usually a 61/2 medium but these tend to run narrow.
customer_reviews.author: B. Berger

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: I have 11 pr.of these now fit my foot perfect.and they have.memory foam and are.super comfortable love them and they all fit the same
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Penix

customer_reviews.title: Coo! for my size!
customer_reviews.text: My feets is small, not wide and thin. It fits just fine. Not perfect but wearable. They look nice.
customer_reviews.author: Cliente de Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Keds double slipon
customer_reviews.text: Love love love them! I wear a size 8 and they fit perfect, very cushiony and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: steve kalaitzis

customer_reviews.title: Heal rubs - not recommended as walking shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love color and style. Heal still rubs after 6 months of wear. Not a good walking shoe because of this. Still get blisters.
customer_reviews.author: Gail A. Zakrajsek

customer_reviews.title: Attractive summer shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great summer shoe. Attractive goes with about any outfit, received lot of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Karla A Decker

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves them!
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves her shoes. She says they are supper comfortable!!
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Vinasco

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking shoes but they smooshed my toes.
customer_reviews.text: I'm jealous that my feet are too wide to wear these. Great for folks with narrow feet.
customer_reviews.author: Lois Lane

customer_reviews.title: Alright
customer_reviews.text: I like them. They are comfortable but when I first put them on they were tight but they have loosened up after wearing them for awhile
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Jones

customer_reviews.title: snug
customer_reviews.text: Overall the shoes are super cute but they are a bit more snug that I’d like. They’re definitely more narrow in comparison to Vans slip ones but they do look more feminine. I still fit the size I would typically wear but it would definitely be tight if I were to wear socks thicker than footies.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Not wide width!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these in Wide Width, and no way were they actually. They were narrow. But looked nice and good color. Returned
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Ellison

customer_reviews.title: Keds Women's Double Decker  Suede Sneaker
customer_reviews.text: I've only worn these once but, they were very comfortable. And they will be a go to shoe for me..
customer_reviews.author: Boomsign@bellsouth.net

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes they are so comfortable I will be ordering more colors!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Wood

customer_reviews.title: Favorite shoes!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these comfy shoes, they are my must have when I walk out the door.
customer_reviews.author: MommaL

customer_reviews.title: That items can be returned if fit is not good
customer_reviews.text: The shoe was too narrow. Loved the shoe quality but just too narrow.
customer_reviews.author: Cathie

customer_reviews.title: Too small!
customer_reviews.text: No happy with these at all! I bought them for a trip, paid an extra 13 dollars to have them here before we left and they don’t even fit!!
customer_reviews.author: jordan steen

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfy
customer_reviews.text: Very cute! It did take a day of walking to break them in, but now they are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: J Gehman

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Slip-ons
customer_reviews.text: Good fit, comfortable and cute. I would buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: khanretty

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and stylish
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a size 8 1/2 but ordered an 8 in this shoe and it seems to work fine.
customer_reviews.author: D. Moffitt

customer_reviews.title: Cute shies
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe, I would go up 1/2 a size. They seem a bit snug to me.
customer_reviews.author: S. Farschon

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very comfortable and versatile. They look great with skirts and dresses. I recommend using Keds socks or no socks. You can still see part of other types “no show” socks.
customer_reviews.author: JMJ

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love them! So comfortable, and adorable too! I get complemented all the time.
customer_reviews.author: It's Just Me

customer_reviews.title: Able to wear these shoes all day long.
customer_reviews.text: These are a great pair of slip on shoes. Sooooo comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Mary L. Young

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and cute
customer_reviews.text: Add a little bit of class to your athleticoutfit with these. My feet felt comfortable all day long!
customer_reviews.author: zoomom3

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: First putting them on, they were a little snug. But after that they stretched out a little. Suuuuuper confortable. Can wear with different outfits. Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Kapui

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! They are super comfy and go well with a lot of different outfits! I want all the colors!!!
customer_reviews.author: Maria G.

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and super cute style. I ordered the taupe and the color is great!
customer_reviews.author: Diane Tegtmeyer

customer_reviews.title: Not your kids Vans
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are the adult version of the popular Vans slip on. These shoes are so comfortable and the color is a perfect neutral. This is my 4th pair. They’re stylish without being trendy. I’ll definitely preset more.
customer_reviews.author: Alecia

customer_reviews.title: Shoes look great - fit fine
customer_reviews.text: I used shoes as shoes - question makes no sense
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love them!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these sneakers!! They are so comfortable and they look fantastic. I did spray them with suade protectant.
customer_reviews.author: Malissa P.

customer_reviews.title: Nice color and fit.
customer_reviews.text: Nice color and material. Very comfortable and stylish walking shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great show!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe that is comfortable and fashionable. Such a pretty color that is very versatile.
customer_reviews.author: really k

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoe. They go with many different outfits. I regret buying the suede, but that’s my own fault. I do a lot of walking at work and these do not hurt my feet or rub blisters.
customer_reviews.author: Emily McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Great for my wide feet!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in size 9 hoping they would fit my really wide feet. Perfect. They are super comfortable and look nice than a pair of regular sneakers when running around town. Will buy another in a different color !
customer_reviews.author: Meg S

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe and highly recommend. I got the beige and it’s so nice. Goes with everything.
customer_reviews.author: Zeller’s puck

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect! I forgot how great Keds were and feel! 100% happy with my purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Linda L.

customer_reviews.title: Love love love theses sneaker loafers
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable slip in tennis shoes. I wear them everywhere and forget i have shoes on when I get in the house- we do t wear shoes in our home.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Kearney Gallo

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! They fit as expected and are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Cox

customer_reviews.title: this is size shoe I normally wear but these were too small
customer_reviews.text: did not fit though this is my normal size these were too small
customer_reviews.author: Joe L. Bell

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable. I did read other reviews and order a 1/2 size up and they are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: nicole mcnew

customer_reviews.title: Gift idea for daughter
customer_reviews.text: She picked them out so they will be a hit at Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: kevin troxell

customer_reviews.title: Great insole
customer_reviews.text: These are a favorite shoe now! They have a great feeling insole! The color is perfect to match up with about anything.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie

customer_reviews.title: Nice Casual Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great color. Very comfortable. On a recent vacation to Europe 3 of us took this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Holliday

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes and have been wearing them a ton!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute but ran large
customer_reviews.text: I had to return these, twice, due to size. I gave up. They are cute though.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Parker

customer_reviews.title: Love them for every day wear
customer_reviews.text: I love keds I own like four colors and they’re very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Rust

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. One of my favorite pair of shoes. Have them in different colors. I have a narrow foot and fits great.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Ellison

customer_reviews.title: They are a good walking shoe
customer_reviews.text: I wear the sneakers with pants, shorts and skirts The sneakers are very versatile .
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: These are really comfortable. The run a little large/wide, but that worked out ok for me.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Schmidt

product_meta.title: Keds Women's Double Decker Suede Sneaker
product_meta.description: A lesson in simple chic—our cushiony Double Decker leather slip on sneaker is one of those staples that always answers “what to wear.” Choose from 4 ultra-wearable shades: classic white, sleek black, rich cognac, or easy natural—or collect them all (your wardrobe will thank you).
